# mRNA Expression of Celllular Markers 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

home = getwd()
output= paste0(home, "/output/")

source(paste0(home,"/code/custom_functions.R"))

library(DESeq2)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(pheatmap)

opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, 
               fig.height = 7, 
               fig.width = 9, 
               message = TRUE,
               warning = TRUE,
               fig.align='center',
               dpi=500
)

```

```{r load_data}

load(paste0(output,"/D62_dds_matrix.RData"))

```
